attributes.action: nominate Daniel Hannan for a knighthood in Her Majesty's Birthday Honours for his outstanding and truthful speech to the European Parliament.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Give Daniel Hannan, MEP, a knighthood or some other honour for standing up for the British People and saying what we are all, after all, thinking.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
